# LOG10E

> Base 10 logarithm of the mathematical constant [_e_][eulers-number].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var LOG10E = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-log10-e' );
```

#### LOG10E

Base 10 logarithm of the mathematical constant [_e_][eulers-number].

```javascript
var bool = ( LOG10E === 0.4342944819032518 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var LOG10E = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-log10-e' );

console.log( LOG10E );
// => 0.4342944819032518
```

</section>
